```{r}
library(Trex)
list <- readRDS("./data/filtered_seuratObjects.rds")
```

```{r}
list  <- runTrex(list, AA.method = "auto", 
                    AA.properties = "AF", 
                    nearest.method = "nn",
                    near.neighbor = 40,
                    n.dim = 50,
                    reduction.name = "Trex.AF")
```
